sign_up.name: Sign Up for Account
sign_up.expected_outcome: User account created, verification email sent

complete_profile.name: Complete Your Profile
steps: After sign up, navigate to /profile or click profile icon
Fill in required fields: First name, Last name
Fill in optional fields: Bio, Company, Role, Industry

create_offer.name: Create an Offer
create_offer.description: Create a marketplace offer to introduce people to your connections
steps: In left sidebar, click 'My Offers' (icon: handshake)
In the main content area, see 'My Offers' card
Click blue 'Create Offer' button (with + icon) in top-right of card
- Title: What you're offering (e.g., 'Connect with Google Engineer')
- Connection: Select from dropdown (your 1st degree connections)
- Description: Details about this person and what they can help with
- Target Position: Their role (e.g., 'Senior Software Engineer')
- Price: Amount you charge for intro (INR/USD/EUR, can be 0 for free)
- Upload photo: Optional image for the offer
Click 'Create Offer' button at bottom of modal
Target connection gets approval request message in their Messages
You see the offer in 'My Offers' with yellow 'Pending Approval' badge
create_offer.expected_outcome: Offer created with 'pending_approval' status, target gets notification

wait_for_approval.name: Wait for Offer Approval
wait_for_approval.description: After creating offer, wait for target to approve
what_happens: Target receives message in their Messages with type 'offer_approval_request'
Message shows: Title, your name, Approve/Decline buttons
- Offer becomes visible in marketplace (Feed → Offers tab)

view_my_offers.name: View My Offers
steps: See list of your offers in card grid

edit_offer.name: Edit an Offer
steps: Find the offer card you want to edit
Click pencil (Edit) icon in top-right of card

send_connection_request.name: Send Connection Request
steps: OR search for a user by name
send_connection_request.expected_outcome: Connection request sent, pending their approval

accept_connection.name: Accept Connection Request
steps: Connection is added to your network
accept_connection.expected_outcome: Connection added, both can now message each other

message_connection.name: Send Message to Connection
steps: See list of conversations on left
Click on a connection to open chat
OR click 'New Message' and select connection
Type message in input field at bottom
Press Enter or click Send icon
message_connection.expected_outcome: Message sent, connection can read and reply

browse_feed_offers.name: Browse Marketplace Offers
steps: Main content shows marketplace offers grid

create_chain_request.name: Create Connection Chain
steps: - Target: Who you want to meet
- Message: Why you want the intro
- Reward: Credits you'll pay for successful connection
Chain is published to your network
People can join to help connect you
create_chain_request.expected_outcome: Chain created and visible to your network

view_wallet.name: Check Wallet Balance
steps: See current balance displayed at top
Can purchase more credits with 'Buy Credits' button

book_intro_call.name: Request Introduction Call
book_intro_call.description: Request an AI-moderated intro call through marketplace offers
steps: Go to Feed page (/) → Offers tab
Click 'Book a Call' button on an offer card
Request is sent to the offer creator
They receive a message in their Messages with approve/reject buttons
If approved: Call is scheduled and you get join link

ui_elements.label: Book a Call
ui_elements.location: Offer cards in Feed → Offers tab

book_intro_call.expected_outcome: Call request sent, awaiting approval from offer creator

view_intro_calls.name: View My Intro Calls
view_intro_calls.description: See all intro call requests and bookings
steps: See tabs: 'Incoming Requests', 'My Requests', 'Scheduled Calls', 'Past Calls'
Incoming Requests: Approve or reject call requests from others
My Requests: Track status of your call requests
Scheduled Calls: View upcoming calls with join links
Past Calls: See history of completed calls
view_intro_calls.expected_outcome: View and manage all intro call activities

join_intro_call.name: Join an Introduction Call
steps: Go to Dashboard → Intros → Scheduled Calls
Click 'Join Call' button when call time arrives
You'll be connected to AI-moderated video call
AI assistant helps facilitate the introduction
join_intro_call.expected_outcome: Join live video call with AI moderation

browse_marketplace_offers.name: Browse Marketplace Offers
browse_marketplace_offers.description: View offers from your network in the public marketplace
steps: Click 'Offers' tab in left sidebar (or mobile menu)
- Connection details (person being offered for intro)
Click 'Book a Call' to request intro
browse_marketplace_offers.expected_outcome: Browse and request intros through marketplace offers
browse_marketplace_offers.note: This shows PUBLIC offers from your network - different from 'My Offers' in Dashboard

create_offer.location: Dashboard → My Offers → 'My Offers' card header (top-right)

where_is_create_offer_button.question: Where is the Create Offer button?
where_is_create_offer_button.answer: Go to Dashboard → My Offers (click in left sidebar) → Look for blue 'Create Offer' button with + icon in the 'My Offers' card header (top-right corner)

how_to_see_my_offers.question: Where can I see my offers?
how_to_see_my_offers.answer: Go to /dashboard?tab=offers OR Dashboard → My Offers (click in left sidebar). You'll see all offers YOU created with status badges (Pending/Active/Rejected).

where_are_marketplace_offers.question: Where can I see marketplace offers?
where_are_marketplace_offers.answer: Go to Feed page (/) → Click 'Offers' tab in left sidebar. This shows PUBLIC offers from your network that you can book calls for. This is different from 'My Offers' in Dashboard.

how_to_message_someone.question: How do I send a message?
how_to_message_someone.answer: Go to /dashboard?tab=messages OR Dashboard → Messages (left sidebar) → Click on a connection or 'New Message'

offer_not_visible.question: I created an offer but can't see it in marketplace
offer_not_visible.answer: Check the status in Dashboard → My Offers. If it says 'Pending Approval', the target person hasn't approved it yet. Once they approve in their Messages, it will become 'Active' and appear in Feed → Offers marketplace.

difference_my_offers_vs_marketplace.question: What's the difference between 'My Offers' and 'Offers' in Feed?
difference_my_offers_vs_marketplace.answer: 'My Offers' (Dashboard tab) shows offers YOU created. 'Offers' (Feed tab) shows PUBLIC marketplace offers from your network that you can book intro calls for.

how_to_book_intro_call.question: How do I book an intro call?
how_to_book_intro_call.answer: Go to Feed (/) → Offers tab → Find an offer → Click 'Book a Call'. The creator will get a request and can approve/reject it.

where_are_my_messages.question: Where are my messages?
where_are_my_messages.answer: Go to /dashboard?tab=messages OR Dashboard → Messages (click in left sidebar). You'll see all conversations with your connections.

how_to_check_wallet.question: Where can I see my credits balance?
how_to_check_wallet.answer: Go to /dashboard?tab=wallet OR Dashboard → Wallet (click in left sidebar). You'll see your balance and can buy more credits.

how_to_find_people.question: How do I find new people to connect with?
how_to_find_people.answer: Go to /dashboard?tab=people OR Dashboard → Discover People (click in left sidebar). You'll see suggested connections.

how_to_view_my_network.question: Where can I see my connections?
how_to_view_my_network.answer: Go to /dashboard?tab=network OR Dashboard → My Network (click in left sidebar). You'll see all your connections and pending requests.

what_are_chains.question: What are connection chains?
what_are_chains.answer: Connection chains are requests to connect with someone through your network. People join chains to help connect you to your target. Go to /dashboard (My Chains tab) to see yours.

keyboard_shortcut_ai.question: Is there a keyboard shortcut for the AI assistant?
keyboard_shortcut_ai.answer: Yes! Press Cmd+K (Mac) or Ctrl+K (Windows) to open/close the AI assistant from anywhere in the app.
